channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Microsoft SQL Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Microsoft SQL Server

item.title: CVE-2020-0618|2024-09-18T18:05:26.778Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20sql%20server
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Microsoft SQL Server Reporting Services when it incorrectly handles page requests, aka 'Microsoft SQL Server Reporting Services Remote Code Execution Vulnerability'.
